Power_Bolt.help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Bone_Smasher.help: This melee attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a good chance to Disorient the target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Power_Push.help: This ranged attack deals little damage, but sends the target flying for a great distance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Power_Push.shortHelp: Ranged Minor DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback

Power_Blast.help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Power_Boost.help: Greatly boosts the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Boost last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You tap into your inner power and boost the abilities of your next few attacks.

Whirling_Hands.help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Total_Focus.help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This melee attack is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Sniper_Blast.help: A focused blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Power_Burst.help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
